org.osmdroid.views.overlay.infowindow

Class BasicInfoWindow

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.osmdroid.views.overlay.infowindow.InfoWindow
      • org.osmdroid.views.overlay.infowindow.BasicInfoWindow
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    MarkerInfoWindow

    public class BasicInfoWindow
extends InfoWindow
    BasicInfoWindow is the default implementation of InfoWindow for an OverlayWithIW. It handles a title, a description and a sub-description. Clicking on the bubble will close it.
    See Also:
    Marker
